reviewText: Fatness and fat loss are always in focus because of a sedentary lifestyle. It's great to have a professional fat-burning exercise program. Working out, while watching these DVDs, makes fat-fighting and calorie-burning exercise more fun and motivational. Moreover it's good to know that such a program is developed and compiled by a professional trainer.

I can't say enough about Justin Lord. I have been hesitant to begin working out because it has always seemed like such a daunting task. With Justin's easy to follow instructions, clear movements that build on one another, it just takes all the fear out of working out and makes it easy and achievable.

This DVD is perfect for beginners and really those of any fitness level.  This DVD made time fly and I actually looked forward to repeating it the next day.  I felt like I had a workout that really worked me out yet didn't keep me in tears throughout.  What a great series to finally find!
